languages.text: "Часть судов противника спешно выходит из боевых порядков. Они перестраиваются и оттягиваются назад для... отражения атаки с тыла! Похоже, кто-то пришел к нам на помощь. Враг рассредоточен, это оптимальный момент для атаки".

"Some of the enemy ships are breaking formation in haste. They are regrouping and falling back to repel an attack from the rear! Looks like someone has arrived to lend us a hand. The enemy is scattered, now is the time to engage."
languages.original_text: "Часть судов противника спешно выходит из боевых порядков. Они перестраиваются и оттягиваются назад для... отражения атаки с тыла! Похоже, кто-то пришел к нам на помощь. Враг рассредоточен, это оптимальный момент для атаки".

traits.locale_text: "The enemy has been attacked from the back and is regrouping in haste, their formations are broken. Looks like we have allies here."
"The enemy has been attacked from the back and is regrouping in haste, their formations are broken. Looks like we have allies here."
"The enemy has been attacked from the rear and is regrouping in haste, their formations are broken. Looks like we have allies here."
"The enemy has been attacked from the rear and is regrouping in haste, their formations are broken. Looks like we have allies here."

"Some of the enemy ships are breaking formation in haste. They are regrouping and falling back to repel an attack from the rear! Looks like someone has arrived to lend us a hand. The enemy is scattered, now is the time to engage."

languages.text: “一部分敌舰正在匆忙调整阵型。他们正在重新集结，向后撤退，对付来自后方的袭击！看来是有人过来帮我们了。敌人正在四散溃逃，是时候出击了。”
languages.original_text: "Some of the enemy ships are breaking formation in haste. They are regrouping and falling back to repel an attack from the rear! Looks like someone has arrived to lend us a hand. The enemy is scattered, now is the time to engage."

traits.locale_text: “一部分敌舰正在匆忙调整阵型。他们正在重新集结，向后撤退，对付来自后方的袭击！看来是有人过来帮我们了。敌人正在四散溃逃，是时候出击了。”

languages.text: « Certains des vaisseaux ennemis se redéploient à la hâte. Ils battent en retraite avant de se regrouper pour repousser une attaque venue de l'arrière ! Apparemment, nous avons des renforts inattendus. La formation ennemie est compromise, c'est le moment ou jamais de passer à l'attaque. »
languages.original_text: "Some of the enemy ships are breaking formation in haste. They are regrouping and falling back to repel an attack from the rear! Looks like someone has arrived to lend us a hand. The enemy is scattered, now is the time to engage."

traits.locale_text: « Certains des vaisseaux ennemis se redéploient à la hâte. Ils battent en retraite avant de se regrouper pour repousser une attaque venue de l'arrière ! Apparemment, nous avons des renforts inattendus. La formation ennemie est compromise, c'est le moment ou jamais de passer à l'attaque. »

languages.text: "Einige der feindlichen Schiffe brechen eilig aus ihrer Formation aus. Sie sammeln sich neu und fallen zurück, um einen Angriff von hinten abzuwehren! Es ist wohl jemand gekommen, um uns zu helfen. Der Feind ist verstreut, jetzt müssen wir angreifen."
languages.original_text: "Some of the enemy ships are breaking formation in haste. They are regrouping and falling back to repel an attack from the rear! Looks like someone has arrived to lend us a hand. The enemy is scattered, now is the time to engage."

traits.locale_text: "Einige der feindlichen Schiffe brechen eilig aus ihrer Formation aus. Sie sammeln sich neu und fallen zurück, um einen Angriff von hinten abzuwehren! Es ist wohl jemand gekommen, um uns zu helfen. Der Feind ist verstreut, jetzt müssen wir angreifen."

languages.text: «Algunas de las naves enemigas han abandonado apresuradamente la formación. ¡Se están reagrupando para responder a un ataque por la retaguardia! Parece que alguien ha acudido a echarnos una mano. El enemigo está disperso. Es hora de atacar».
languages.original_text: "Some of the enemy ships are breaking formation in haste. They are regrouping and falling back to repel an attack from the rear! Looks like someone has arrived to lend us a hand. The enemy is scattered, now is the time to engage."

traits.locale_text: «Algunas de las naves enemigas han abandonado apresuradamente la formación. ¡Se están reagrupando para responder a un ataque por la retaguardia! Parece que alguien ha acudido a echarnos una mano. El enemigo está disperso. Es hora de atacar».

languages.text: 「敵艦の何隻かが、急いで陣形を崩しています。後方からの攻撃を撃退するため、再編成して後退しています！誰かが手を貸してくれるようです。敵は散り散りになっている今が、交戦のチャンスです」
languages.original_text: "Some of the enemy ships are breaking formation in haste. They are regrouping and falling back to repel an attack from the rear! Looks like someone has arrived to lend us a hand. The enemy is scattered, now is the time to engage."

traits.locale_text: 「敵艦の何隻かが、急いで陣形を崩しています。後方からの攻撃を撃退するため、再編成して後退しています！誰かが手を貸してくれるようです。敵は散り散りになっている今が、交戦のチャンスです」

languages.text: "Düşman gemilerinden bazıları, saflarını aceleyle terk ediyor. Arkalarından saldıran var, o tarafı kapatmaya çalışıyorlar! Belli ki birileri imdadımıza yetişmiş. Düşman dağılmış vaziyette, taarruz fırsatı doğdu."
languages.original_text: "Some of the enemy ships are breaking formation in haste. They are regrouping and falling back to repel an attack from the rear! Looks like someone has arrived to lend us a hand. The enemy is scattered, now is the time to engage."
